channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: Ofcomは、保守党の政治家による5つのGBニュース番組が公平性規則に違反しているとし、同チャンネルに "通告 "した（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）。
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
Ofcom rules that five GB News programmes presented by Conservative politicians have broken its due impartiality rules and puts the channel “on notice”  —  Programmes presented by Jacob Rees-Mogg, Esther McVey and Philip Davies were found in breach.

item.title: Sunoは音楽制作の「民主化」を目指しており、そのモデルはテキストプロンプトを使って人間のボーカルを含む曲を作曲することができる（Brian Hiatt/Rolling Stone）。
item.description:
Brian Hiatt / Rolling Stone:
Inside generative AI music startup Suno, whose model can compose songs, including human vocals, using a text prompt, as Suno aims to “democratize” music making  —  Suno wants everyone to be able to produce their own pro-level songs — but what does that mean for artists?

item.title: セレブ主催のインタビューポッドキャストの台頭を見る。その長い放送時間は、ゲストが深く個人的なトピックを掘り下げることを意味し、まるでセラピーセッションのようだ（サム・ウォルフソン／The Guardian）。
item.description:
Sam Wolfson / The Guardian:
A look at the rise of celebrity-hosted interview podcasts, whose long running times mean guests delve into deep and personal topics, resembling therapy sessions  —  Pop stars, politicians, princes all seem to have the same job these days - podcast interviewer.

item.title: 政治記者エイミー・チョージックとのQ&A：著書『ヒラリーを追え』を基にしたマックスシリーズ『The Girls on the Bus』の共同制作、選挙のフィクション化などについて（Eric Deggans/NPR）
item.description:
Eric Deggans / NPR:
Q&A with political reporter Amy Chozick on co-creating Max series The Girls on the Bus based on her book Chasing Hillary, fictionalizing the election, and more  —  The first question I have for Amy Chozick, an executive producer and co-creator of the new Max series The Girls on the Bus, is a simple one.

item.title: 米国の高校新聞はデジタルだけの戦略を捨て、レトロな魅力があり、デジタルコンテンツ過多から生徒を解放する印刷物に移行している（Belle Cushing/Columbia Journalism Review）
item.description:
Belle Cushing / Columbia Journalism Review:
US high school papers are ditching digital only strategies for print, which has a retro appeal and offers students a respite from digital content overload  —  In 2022, on the day they met, Zoe Otto and Orlena Fella decided they wanted to start a newspaper at their school …

item.title: 法的情勢、ビジネス関係への懸念、オンライン・ニュースの没落などにより、権力に立ち向かうようなハードヒットな記事を求める報道機関は少ない（マックス・タニ／Semafor）。
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
Few news outlets seek hard hitting pieces that confront power due to the legal climate, business relationship concerns, online news outlets' downfall, and more  —  There's too much to read and watch, too many places to read and watch it.  It's enough to distract you from the biggest news …

item.title: ボブ・アイガーの後任となるディズニーの有力な社内候補者と、彼らがディズニーでの包括的な経験がないことを取締役会だけが重視すべきではないことを考察（Lucas Shaw/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Lucas Shaw / Bloomberg:
A look at Disney's leading internal candidates to replace Bob Iger and how their lack of comprehensive experience at Disney should not be the board's sole focus  —  None of the four leading candidates has the perfect resume for the top job.  Neither did Bob Iger when he was first named CEO.

item.title: CBSのジョージ・チークスとのQ&A：Paramount+と放送のどちらを選ぶか、番組開発サイクルの再考、フランチャイズ開発などについて（Josef Adalian/Vulture）
item.description:
Josef Adalian / Vulture:
Q&A with CBS' George Cheeks on choosing which shows to put on Paramount+ or broadcast, rethinking the show development cycle, developing franchises, and more  —  The failure of Hollywood studios to strike a timely deal with writers and actors last summer meant the traditional fall TV season was canceled in 2023.

item.title: DirecTVが "No Locals "パッケージを導入、顧客は地元テレビ局の受信を拒否し、月額12ドルの割引を受けることができる（Jon Lafayette/Next TV）
item.description:
Jon Lafayette / Next TV:
DirecTV introduces a “No Locals” package, which allows customers to opt out of receiving their local TV stations and receive discounts of $12 per month  —  Subscribers would get $12 discount if they opt out  —  DirecTV said it would be allowing customers to opt out of receiving …

item.title: BI調査でMITの論文が盗作であるとの批判を受けたネリ・オックスマンの弁護士がアクセル・スプリンガーに送った77ページに及ぶ書簡から学んだこと（Bill Grueskin/Columbia Journalism Review）
item.description:
Bill Grueskin / Columbia Journalism Review:
Lessons learned from the 77-page letter sent to Axel Springer by a lawyer for Neri Oxman, whose MIT thesis faced scrutiny for plagiarism in a BI investigation  —  Last fall, as then-Harvard president Claudine Gay was facing her first allegations of plagiarism, the Clare Locke law firm sent …

item.title: イーロン・マスクがドン・レモンに求愛し、Xが右翼の道具ではないことを示した。
item.description:
Tim Higgins / Wall Street Journal:
How Elon Musk courted Don Lemon to show that X isn't a right-wing tool, as the breakup highlights Linda Yaccarino's thankless task of trying to assure brands  —  Unexpected split leaves X CEO Linda Yaccarino with another loss  —  Don Lemon got to see both sides of Elon Musk.

item.title: フランスの海運億万長者ロドルフ・サード氏が、パトリック・ドラヒ氏のアルティス・メディア（フランスのニュース専門チャンネルBFM TVを含む）を15億5000万ユーロで買収することで合意した。
item.description:
Benoit Berthelot / Bloomberg:
French shipping billionaire Rodolphe Saadé agrees to buy Patrick Drahi's Altice Media, including French news channel BFM TV, in a deal valued at €1.55B  —  - Altice Media includes French news channel BFM TV, RMC radio  — Deal with Saadé family could help Drahi cut debt pile

item.title: イギリスのユーチューバー2人がタッカー・カールソンを騙り、ケイト・ミドルトンの画像加工について偽のケンジントン宮殿の内部告発者にインタビューさせる（Jake Kanter/Deadline）
item.description:
Jake Kanter / Deadline:
Two British YouTubers dupe Tucker Carlson into interviewing a fake Kensington Palace whistleblower about Kate Middleton's doctored image  —  Tucker Carlson has been pranked over Kate Middleton's infamous edited photo.  —  The former Fox News anchor was duped by British YouTubers Josh & Archie …

item.title: ローカルニュースサイト「ギルフォード・ドラゴン・ニュース」が英国初の慈善公益ニュースプロバイダーとなり、さまざまな税制優遇措置の恩恵を受けられるようになった（Alexandra Topping/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Alexandra Topping / The Guardian:
Local news website The Guildford Dragon News has become the UK's first charitable public interest news provider and can now benefit from a range of tax breaks  —  Guildford Dragon will be able to benefit from tax breaks after becoming UK's first charitable public interest news provider

item.title: Twitch、Prime Video Watch Partyを2024年4月2日から削除予定、Watch Partyは2020年開始、ストリーマーが視聴者にPrime Videoコンテンツを放送可能に（Mariella Moon/Engadget）
item.description:
Mariella Moon / Engadget:
Twitch plans to remove Prime Video Watch Party from April 2, 2024; Watch Party launched in 2020, allowing streamers to broadcast Prime Video content to viewers  —  Apparently people aren't too nostalgic for the days of hiding inside.  —  If you're one of the — apparently few …
